attributes.action: Bring back WEEKLY Child Benefit for WORKING Parents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I suggest that Child Benefit, for working parents , should return to weekly payments, should the claimant request it.  I find it very unfair that parents who work should get their's monthly. Most of us working parents get paid monthly, so do we really have to suffer yet another income paid monthly.

rejection.details: Please re-draft without all the CAPITALS - they make it hard for people to read
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
